body.name: Nitafxhu NT61 60% Mechanical Gaming Keyboard Full RGB Backlit PBT Pudding keycaps 61key Ultra-Compact Wired Keyboard Programmable for PC/Mac Gamers,Hot-Swappable Mechanical Brown Switch-White Keyboard
deliveryMessages: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: ⌨【60% Gaming Keyboard Compact Layout】NT61 is 60percent gaming keyboard ，it also 61 keys mechanical gaming keyboard that offers a compact and space-saving design, perfect for gamers who prefer a minimalist setup without compromising on functionality. This mini pc gaming keyboard can save more space for your mouse moving and neat the desktop. 🎁Also, the wired gaming keyboard is a good choice as a Christmas/Thanksgiving gift.

📺【Hot Swappable Mechanical Gaming Keyboard】NT61 Mechanical gaming keyboard has hot-swappable mechanical brown switche is a favorite among enthusiasts for their smooth and satisfying typing experience as well as their lightning-fast gaming performance. The gaming keyboard switch providing a satisfying tactile typing experience and it is also very quite. It can be exchanged with all 2pin mechanical switch. Please pay attention to the position of the pin connections to avoid pin damage or breakage, which makes the switch unusable.

🌟【Pudding keycap ，RGB Backlit and Driver】NT61 is equipped with a Pudding keycap, the lighting effect is better than that of a regular keycap keyboard，The 60% RGB keyboard include 14 RGB backlight modes, 8 monochrome backlight modes ，11 full-color backlight modes ，Musical Rhythm and 16 million color light and key combination modes can use the driver to complete the customization you want.

🎁【Ergonomic Design and Mechanical Feel】NT61 mechanical gaming keyboard is a mechanical gaming keyboard with the scientific stair-up design and equipped PBT pudding keycaps brings maximum comfort, keeping your hand in a most natural state to minimize hand fatigue after longtime use and help you minimize typos，more practical for Gamers and Typist

🎁【Wide Compatibility Gaming Keyboard】Hot swap mechanical keyboard is compatible with Windows and Mac, computer which support windows series system and IOS system. Based on ergonomic design, the mini gaming keyboard provides you with maximum comfort and reduces hand fatigue after prolonged use. This computer gaming keyboard featured with waterproof, dust-proof, FN short key function, non-slip mat, Type-c interface, plug and play,easy to clean. Perfect for copywriter, typing teacher and editors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fancy Gaming Keyboard
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard is a reliable product with nice feeling of touch. It also has fancy lighting coming with it automatically showing wonderful colors every time I use it. Totally recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brilliant Mechanical Keyboard with Diverse Preset RGB Lighting!
reviews.reviewText: This mechanical keyboard is a gem! The preset RGB lighting options are a visual treat, offering a multitude of dazzling effects that add an exciting touch to my setup. While it's not customizable in terms of creating unique lighting setups, the variety of preloaded lighting modes more than make up for it.The keyboard's build quality is exceptional, providing a solid and responsive typing experience. The tactile feedback from the switches is satisfying, ensuring precise keystrokes whether I'm typing furiously or gaming intensely. Its sturdy construction instills confidence in its durability, promising long-term reliability.Beyond its stunning lighting, the keyboard's functionality and ease of use are impressive. The keys are responsive and consistent, making typing and gaming a joy. The plug-and-play nature of the keyboard makes setup effortless, and its compatibility with various devices is a definite plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works good with Mac, a bit small but the lights are pretty. I like the clicking sound and there are so many colors for you to switch to. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas present. When he got it he loved it. The color is great. The keys are very smooth. My husband uses it to play world of tanks and he told me he loved it. Im so glad I bought it for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I really like the white keyboard also very clean very good, tapping makes me smooth, all in all it's just a very good product, I like this one more than the previous one, these nice lights make me really like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This brown-axis mechanical keyboard feels good and quiet. There are many colors that can be customized without being too exaggerated. To my surprise, it can be used on my iPad (type C), which is a surprise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, great quality!
reviews.reviewText: Was finishing a full restore/rebuild on a pathe table top model. Was coming to the end of the work and needed needles. I ordered the 300 pack with soft, medium, and loud. Came fast and excellent quality. Couldn't be happier. Will be sending any and all business I can your way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit really well and looks great

reviews.reviewText: I gave this to my friend for a secret santa gift and he said he loved it. Especially the sound of the keys and how portable the keyboard was, it made for a pretty good gaming keyboard. I feel like it'd be perfect for people getting into the mechanical keyboard world and starting to want a higher quality keyboard
Great mechanical keyboard within a budget
